results.title: pacman - ArchWiki
results.content: Thepacmanpackage manager is one of the major distinguishing features ofArchLinux. It combines a simple binary package format with an easy-to-useArchbuild system. The goal ofpacmanis to make it possible to easily manage packages, whether they are from the official repositories or the user's own builds.pacmankeeps the system up-to-date by synchronizing package lists with the master ...

results.title: 10+ pacman command Examples Arch Linux [Cheat Sheet]
results.content: Archis targeted more toward power users who like to have complete customization control over how their packages are built and added to the system.Archuses a package-management tool calledpacman, which can be used to install both pre-built, binary packages and custom-built packages.
